body: Hi Masoome, You need to flatten the surfaces list before generating the points so it removes empty branches. Also model creation can be done in an easier way. I cleaned it a little bit but haven't changes the logic. Mostapha [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/iJVROLF4NIvsLUzd1lNY4TlPaj-ZnPCfPDJ03*BkT709euqhoak8gz1ocAGG5AFJYcwMq0w-wzfbso76tFgaGP0ol8fATkPp/testSrf.png)
